about_the_game:
Be prepared to face the frozen hordes of the Etherian Mountains. This pack features a unique costume for the Huntress and other goodies to aid you in your quest to fight back against the Old Ones!

This pack may only be purchased once per account. To redeem the items contained in the pack, visit and interact with the Mailbox in the Heroes Marketplace or Private Tavern.

This pack contains:

2,000 Gems to purchase Heroes, Flair, Costumes and more.

1 Frostfanged Huntress Costume to brave the winter frost.

Five Campaign Shard Packs to equip unique bonuses to your heroes and defenses.

This pack may only be purchased once per account. To redeem the items contained in the pack, visit and interact with the Mailbox in the Heroes Marketplace or Private Tavern.

name: Dungeon Defenders II - Fated Winter Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1) 64-Bit
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz Dual-Core CPU
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI Radeon HD 2600 or better / NVIDIA GeForce 8600 or better, 512 MB video memory, with Shader Model 3 support
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound device
  • Additional Notes: Internet connection is required to play.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1) / Windows 8.1 / Windows 10 64-Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or AMD Quad-Core or better
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 260 or AMD Radeon HD 4770 or better (1GB VRAM)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound device
  • Additional Notes: Internet connection is required to play. Integrated graphics chips are not recommended.

short_description: Be prepared to face the frozen hordes of the Etherian Mountains. This pack features a unique costume for the Huntress and other goodies to aid you in your quest to fight back against the Old Ones!
